verses.roman:
eta bali' calilā prabhu sabā āliṅgiyā
sabei paḍilā tathā mūrcchita hañā

synonyms: eta bali'—saying this; calilā—began to proceed; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sabā—all of them; āliṅgiyā—embracing; sabei—all of them; paḍilā—fell down; tathā—there; mūrcchita hañā—fainting.
translation: After saying this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu embraced them all and began to proceed on His way, and they all fainted and fell down.
